alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 28 at 1:38PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY... WHAT...Surfs of 10 to 13 feet WHERE...South and east facing shores of all islands WHEN...Through Saturday IMPACTS...Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 140 AOAULI ASO FARAILE IULAI 28 2023 ...O LOO FAAAUAU LE FAUTUAGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA E OO I LE ASO TOONA`I... MAFUAAGA...O galu maualuluga e 10 i le 13 futu NOFOAGA...O talafatai i saute ma sasa`e o motu uma TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Toona`i AAFIAGA...Aafiaga mai Fautuaga o Galu Maualuluga...O le a iai taimi e fafati maualuluga ai galu i le matafaga ma le aau, e aave foi le sami e faafaigata ma lamatia ai fuafuaga tumatafaga. E ono tutupu foi nai sologa i talafatai o le atunuu. E iai foi taimi, e ono fafati ai galu i le muliava (gutu) o le uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Puipuiga/Tapenaga Faatino mo Fautuaga o Galu Maualuluga:Tagata uma o loo tafafao i le matafaga, auau, fa`apea le `au fa`ase`e galu, e tatau ona fa`autagiaina fautuaga uma e aumaia e tagata o loo puipuia le saogalemu ma ia faatinoina ma le faaeteete.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
